name: Mushroom Mania Plus
description:
Mushroom Mania Plus-Put on your hiking boots and immerse yourself in thick lush autumn forests filled with mushrooms, berries, acorns, flowers and leaves. Hike through hundreds of enchanted levels and solve all the fun magical challenges.
Game features
- Hundreds of unique magical levels!
- Enchanted powerups and combos!
- Easy to learn, challenging to master!
- Hours of entertainment!
- Beautiful lush forest levels!
